params._amountsIn: the amount of each token to use
params._tokensIn: the tokens to use for minting

returns._0: the estimated amount of Gyro dolars minted

params._amountsOut: the amount of each token to receive

returns._0: the estimated amount of Gyro dolars redeemed
the current values of the Gyro fund's reserve

the list of tokens supported by the Gyro fund

params._amountsIn: the amount of each token to use
params._minAmountOut: the minimum number of Gyro dollars wanted, used to prevent against slippage
params._tokensIn: a list of tokens to use to mint Gyro dollars

returns._0: the amount of Gyro dollars minted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._amountsOut: the amount of each token to receive
params._maxRedeemed: the maximum number of Gyro dollars to redeem
params._tokensOut: the tokens to receive in exchange for redeeming Gyro dollars

returns._0: the amount of Gyro dollar redeemed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amountsIn: the amount of each token to use
params._minGyroMinted: the minimum number of Gyro dollars wanted
params._tokensIn: a list of tokens to use to mint Gyro dollars

returns._0: an error code if the call would fail, otherwise 0 See GyroFundV1 for the meaning of each error code

params._amountsOut: the amount of each token to receive
params._maxGyroRedeemed: the maximum number of Gyro dollars to redeem
params._tokensOut: the tokens to receive in exchange for redeeming Gyro dollars

returns._0: an error code if the call would fail, otherwise 0

estimateMintedGyro(address[],uint256[]).notice: This functions approximates how many Gyro dollars would be minted given `_tokensIn` and `_amountsIn`. See the documentation of `mintFromUnderlyingTokens` for more details about these parameters

estimateRedeemedGyro(address[],uint256[].notice: This functions approximates how many Gyro dollars would be redeemed given `_tokensOut` and `_amountsOut`. See the documentation of `redeemToUnderlyingTokens` for more details about these parameters

mintFromUnderlyingTokens(address[],uint2.notice: Mints at least `_minAmountOut` Gyro dollars by using the tokens and amounts passed in `_tokensIn` and `_amountsIn`. `_tokensIn` and `_amountsIn` must be the same length and `_amountsIn[i]` is the amount of `_tokensIn[i]` to use to mint Gyro dollars. This contract should be approved to spend at least the amount given for each token of `_tokensIn`

redeemToUnderlyingTokens(address[],uint2.notice: Redeems at most `_maxRedeemed` to receive exactly `_amountsOut[i]` of each `_tokensOut[i]`. `_tokensOut[i]` and  `_amountsOut[i]` must be the same length and `_amountsOut[i]` is the amount desired of `_tokensOut[i]` This contract should be allowed to spend the amount of Gyro dollars redeemed which is at most `_maxRedeemed`

wouldMintChecksPass(address[],uint256[],.notice: Checks if a call to `mintFromUnderlyingTokens` with the given `_tokensIn`, `_amountsIn and `_minGyroMinted` would succeed or not, and returns the potential error code

wouldRedeemChecksPass(address[],uint256[.notice: Checks if a call to `redeemToUnderlyingTokens` with the given `_tokensOut`, `_amountsOut and `_maxGyroRedeemed` would succeed or not, and returns the potential error code

userdoc.notice: GyroLib is a contract used to add functionality around the GyroFund to allow users to exchange assets for Gyro rather than having to use already minted Balancer Pool Tokens
